string-array.name: descriptionSnacks
string-array.item: Deepfried snacks. Everyone loves them when they are drunk. So do you. For these delicious party snacks you will need: - Deepfried snacks - Salt - Pepper - Mayonaise - Ketchup

Real american style from New York meets the classics hot dogs. They are very juice and perfect to eat with friends. Items needed for this dish are: - Buns - Hotdogs - Musterd - Ketchup - Salt - Pickles - Baked onions

Exotic and healthy yogurt snack. This is a nice snack for in the summer at home. If you want to make this yourself. You will be needing the following ingrediÃ«tns: - Muesli - Fruits - Greek yogurt - Raspberrys
Rich flavoured yogurt. This meal is light, easy to make and a real filler. It is also low carb. Making this dish requires: - Yogurt - Mint leaves - Raspberrys
